resources.string:
My name is Amanda. 

Soft tacos are just lazy burritos. 

Hard tacos all the way. 

Also, have you tried that Cherry Sunset Freezee thing at Taco Bell? 

No lie, it's the bomb. 

Oh my I need more lines… 

How many more before it starts to scroll? 

I don't know if this is a proper test yet. 

Eeny Meeny Miny Moe… 

I picked a pack of pickled peppers… 

Wait, is that how that goes? 

No, I think it's… 

Peter Piper picked a pack of pickled peppers. 

Okay that's gotta be enough.
